init

public static void init(String jarLocation)
                 throws IOException,
                        SlickException
Initialize the content of the resources list.

Parameters:
jarLocation - The location of the jar that contain resources.
Throws:
IOException - If the jar location is false.
SlickException - If a resource can't be loaded from the jar.

Load the next resource of the list.

isLoadComplete

public static boolean isLoadComplete()
Check if there is no more remaining resource to load.

Returns:
true if there is no more resource to load, false otherwise.

The advancement of the resource list loading in percentage.

the advancement in percentage ( 0 - 100 ).
